EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Survival is not Mandatory CNJ Minneapolis_Q217.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java with Josh Long
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java event in Minneapolis at Object Partners on June 11th.
Please feel free to leave your laptop at home and enjoy the live coding with Pivotal's Josh Long. Happy hour and networking will also continue at Object Partners directly after the event; we hope you can make it.
Date: Sunday, June 11, 2017
Time:
12:45AM to 6:00PM
Location: Object Partners 1515 Central Ave. NE, Suite 100 Minneapolis, MN, 55413 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1515+Central+Ave+NE+%23100,+Minneapolis,+MN+55413/@45.0039529,-93.2482474,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b32d965c06ad57:0x8facb6fbe9a8eb47!8m2!3d45.0039529!4d-93.2460587]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Matt Nelson at mnelson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mnelson@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Survival-is-not-Mandatory-CNJ-Minneapolis.html]]>
